resource1.title: Introduction to Java and programming, basic syntax: variables, data types.

resource2.title: Operators and control structures, methods, functions and parameters.

resource3.title: Input/output with Scanner, simple arrays or strings.

resource4.title: Introduction to OOP (classes, objects, constructors), basic principles: encapsulation, instantiation.

register.contentDescription: Manage your learning with ChroniCaree. A platform designed to help you master the basics of Java programming effectively and systematically.
register.feature1: Complete fundamentals of programming course: from basic concepts to practical projects.
register.feature2: Personalized study plan with reminders and progress tracking.
register.feature3: Practical exercises and real projects to reinforce your learning.
register.feature4: Focused study mode with time tracking and unlockable achievements.
register.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

courseComplete.title: Congratulations!
courseComplete.message1: We want to congratulate you for completing the Java Programming Fundamentals course!
courseComplete.message2: Your dedication and effort have been exceptional. You have successfully learned the basics of Java programming, including:
courseComplete.message8: We are proud of your achievement and hope you continue to grow as a programmer. Keep practicing and exploring new challenges!
courseComplete.message9: Thank you for being part of our learning community.
